title: GitHub CoPilot Samples and Keyboard Shortcuts
snippet: Github Co-Pilot Shortcut Keys and SamplesC# ConstantsCode from CommentsKeyboard ShortcutsTab Accept suggestionEsc Dismiss suggestionAlt+[or] Cycle through suggestionsAlt+,or. Cycle through suggestions (Visual Studio)Ctrl+Alt+\ Trigger SuggestionsCtrl+Alt+Enter Open CopilotCtrl+Enter Open copilot suggestions

title: Running Docker in a Hyper-V VM
snippet: PowerShell command to allow Docker to run in a Hyper-V VMSet-VMProcessor -VMName Dev-DOCKER-Win -ExposeVirtualizationExtensions $true

title: VSCode Active Tab Background Color
snippet: Change the color of the active tab in VSCodeOpen settings.json and add the following to the workbench.colorTheme section. "workbench.colorCustomizations": { "tab.activeBackground": "#8d8888" "tab.inactiveBackground": "#ff0000" }Alternative:File –&gt; Preferences –&gt; Settings and search for workbench.colorTheme and select edit in settings.jsonAdd the snippet above to the file and save.Change the color to suit you.

title: Bicep Notes
snippet: Bicep NotesLinks xxxCommands//Sample hello worldparam yourName stringvar hello = 'Hello World! - Hi'output helloWorld string = '${hello} ${yourName}'resource container 'Micrososoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers@2020-08-01-preview' = { name: '${stAcc.name}/default/${containerName}'}

title: VSCode Settings
snippet: VSCode Shortcuts Ctrl + , Open Settings Ctrl + KS Save AllVSCode SettingsFile &gt; Preferences &gt; Settings and search for term: indent [Workbench &gt; Tree:Indent] set to 20 2.

title: Hello World
snippet: Hello WorldThe need to store my Coding and Config notes and tips in a conveniet location, and interest in learning more about Jekyll was spurred into action by Techno Tim’s recent Jekyll videoLinks Chirpy Jekyll Theme Tim’s Video Commandsbundle exec jekyll sJEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll bgit clone https://git_username:git_personal_access_tokenZ@github.com/git_username/git_username.github.io.gitgit config --global user.name git_usernamegit config --global user.email git_username@mail.com
